publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3459 Alex Neil: G8 Summit—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to publish a detailed account of the costs and benefits of hosting the G8 summit in Scotland and to demonstrate how the First Minister’s claim about its net worth to Scotland is justified. Supported by: Christine Grahame*

S2M-3459 Alex Neil: G8 Summit—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to publish a detailed account of the costs and benefits of hosting the G8 summit in Scotland and to demonstrate how the First Minister’s claim about its net worth to Scotland is justified. Supported by: Christine Grahame
S2M-3459 G8 Summit (lodged on 25 October 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*
